name: Users retrieves a list of books when at least one book is in database
scenarioId: classpath:features/GetAllBooks:Users retrieves a list of books when at least one book is in database
methodName: Users retrieves a list of books when at least one book is in database

testSteps.description: 1: Users retrieves a list of books when at least one book is in database ({Username=admin, Password=password, Title=serenity, Author=john})

children.description: Given the user is logged in with username: "admin" and password: "password" for CREATE
authenticate with username: admin and password: password for CREATE
And user posts the book details title "serenity" and author "john"
post the book
POST http://localhost:7081/api/books

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=5BAABD3827AEB0BB8DC14615BE129BDF; Path=/; HttpOnly
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Fri, 03 Jan 2025 08:57:51 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

children.description: When the user requests the list of all books
GET all books
GET http://localhost:7081/api/books

restQuery.responseHeaders:

children.description: Then the response status code should be 200
Verify status code as 200
And the response should be a list of books containing a book with title: "serenity" and author: "john"
check if the response returned a list including the book with title: serenity and author: john

title: Users retrieves a list of books when at least one book is in database

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the user is logged in with username: "<Username>" and password: "<Password>" for CREATE
And user posts the book details title "<Title>" and author "<Author>"
When the user requests the list of all books
Then the response status code should be 200
And the response should be a list of books containing a book with title: "<Title>" and author: "<Author>"
